moduleMetadataJson.name: OSX Manage Record Microphone
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module will allow the user to detect (with the LIST action) and
          capture (with the RECORD action) audio inputs on a remote OSX machine.
author: joev <joev@metasploit.com>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: MIC_INDEX
options.description: The index of the mic to use. `set ACTION LIST` to get a list.

options.name: TMP_FILE
options.description: The tmp file to use on the remote machine

options.name: AUDIO_COMPRESSION
options.description: Compression type to use for audio

options.name: SYNC_WAIT
options.description: Wait between syncing chunks of output
